transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Haan Komal bhaiya na?
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan ji namaskar Bhalu baat kar raha hun.
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Batayein ji.
Customer: Haan ji sir bataiye aap call kara na customer care pe I think.
Customer: Achcha aap hi bol rahe ho ji.
Executive: Koi ji.
Customer: Haan sir.
Customer: Wo paint ke liye dusri jagah search kar rahe hain na paint apna dusri jagah chahiye.
Customer: Wo jo IndiaMART se mangaya hua tha unse pehle ho nahi paya kaam.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Achcha aap paint paint kharidna chah rahe the?
Customer: Haan paint kharidna chah rahe hain uske liye matlab koi bade contractor koi aap agar yahan se sampark ho sakta hai jo Kanpur mein ho ya fir Gorakhpur mein ho.
Executive: Haan aap IndiaMART pe jaake search kar sakte ho.
Executive: Aapko kya karna hai Kanpur aur Gorakhpur ki location lagani hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai aur uske baad aapke samne jo jo supplier aayenge aapko dekhna hai ki kisne premium service le rakhi hai.
Executive: Ya kaun kitna purana supplier hai wahan pe likha hota hai buyer since 12 years aise 12 saal 15 saal to usse aapko andaza lag jayega ki jo customer market mein jitna purana hai.
Executive: Supplier sorry wo definitely usme bada hi hoga sir hai na aur ye to aapko thoda dekhna padega ki haan ye ye sahi lag raha hai ye thoda achcha supplier lag raha hai aapko wo to baat karke hi pata chalega ki kaun ek second aapko hold.
Customer: Haan sir main thoda der call aa raha hai.
(silence)
Automated Voice: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Automated Voice: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein.
Automated Voice: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Automated Voice: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein.
Automated Voice: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Automated Voice: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein.
Automated Voice: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Automated Voice: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein.
Automated Voice: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Automated Voice: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein.
Customer: Chalo theek hai ji main fir main wahi search karke dekhta hun.
Customer: Haan Komal ji.
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: To Komal ji aisa tha mujhe ye samajh nahi aaya ki abhi aap search kar rahe the to aapne ye customer care pe call kaise kar diya?
Customer: Matlab number dekha aise karke maine start karte karte wo number last mein aaya maine call karke dekhun maine jo bhi hai.
Customer: Yahan se koi aur suggestion mile.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Achcha achcha nahi nahi nahi ye na customer care ka number tha aai jabki kisi se baat ho rahi thi kya IndiaMART ke uh matlab haan isse pehle bhi aapne ek call kara tha to IndiaMART ke kisi representative se baat hui thi employee se?
Customer: Haan ji wo to theek hai abhi abhi kuch der pehle bhi baat hui thi abhi bhi call aa raha hai theek unki.
Executive: To kya baat hui matlab kuch bata rahe honge wo?
Customer: Haan rate wagera bata rahe hain rate bata denge wo clear ho jayega to order maar denge hum to bas seedha.
Executive: Haan haan.
Executive: Wo main ye bata raha tha ki abhi na ye aapki taraf se na customer care pe call gaya hai aur jaise main aapka account manager hun aapko koi bhi problem hoti hai to aap mujhe kar dete ho call.
Customer: Nahi wo to fir main aap hi ko call karta agar aisi koi bech koi baat rehti maine kaha yahan se koi aur suggestion mil jaye isliye maine us number pe call kar diya.
Customer: Aisi koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: To matlab aise waise koi dikkat nahi hai na matlab services sari hamari jo hain theek chal rahi hain discussion mera aapse already ho rakha hai sari cheezon pe.
Customer: Nahi wo to sara kuch ho hi rakha hai.
Executive: Waise to wo to koi waise cheezon pe dikkat nahi thi na matlab aapko kuch samajh nahi aa raha ho aur main aapko.
Customer: Nahi nahi waisa kuch bhi dikkat nahi hai waisa koi dikkat hoti to fir main aap hi ke paas call nahi kar leta koi baat rehti isse koi sampark rehta main aap se call kar leta.
Customer: Uske liye koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Aur haan aur sir ye ab aapka call aa hi gaya to main ek baar ye aur puchh lun ki ye jo road marking paint hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan aur ye RCC road work to ye dono mein bhi aapne kuch lead consume kari hai isko add kar do?
Customer: Paint wali hai paint ka to hai hi apna.
Customer: Paint wale apna clear mil jayega isi tarike se bas ye hai haan haan.
Customer: Dekha hai maine kahin pe kuch thoda bahut kaam milega nahi milega.
Executive: Haan ji RCC road work RCC road work?
Customer: Wo to mere khayal mein rahega add karna sahi.
Customer: Wo kar dijiye bhale se add.
Executive: Jaise RCC.
Customer: Abhi hamara kuch ek aur company ka apna wo udghatan karne wale hain uske baad wo wo karenge fir thoda time lag raha hai bas.
Executive: Matlab ek new company start karne ka soch rahe hain sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Achcha theek hai to main ab aisa tha na ye aapka jo call hai ye customer care pe call hai theek hai to kuch achcha mujhe aapke haan haan isliye mujhe aap se ye sari cheeze discussion dobara se karna pada jo hamara ho chuka hai already.
Customer: Nahi main samajh raha hun matlab thoda koi matlab mujhe koi shikayat ho maine start us jagah call kar diya ye wo hoga na.
Customer: But aisa to kuch hai hi nahi.
Executive: Main samajh gaya samajh gaya.
Executive: To theek hai sir main aisa karta hun ki fir koi koi dikkat to nahi hai theek hai main fir yahan se concern close kar deta hun aur ye road RCC road work ko add kar dunga category ko hai na ek product bana kar theek hai ji kar denge.
Customer: Komal ji iske sahare kuch aur bhi kaam rahega to main dekh jaunga aur.
Executive: Haan bilkul sir aur kya aur road marking paint paint ka ek baar bata dete mujhe kya karna hai isko aise hi rehne dun ya add kar dun?
Customer: Bas paint wale bas bolapan ne wo lene wale hain jaise agar ya to iski humen wo lenge kya bolte hain iski dealership.
Customer: Samajh gaya samajh gaya samajh gaya kya fir apan ne paint ke liye bahut matlab kisi ke rate kuch hai kisi ke rate kuch hai to is tarike se sabhi rate alag alag hain.
Customer: Bahut jyada farak hai rate mein.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai fir isko isko aise hi rehne dete hain.
Executive: To wo aap jo purchase karna chah rahe ho na sir paint paint purchase karna chah rahe ho na sir aap to paint purchase karne ke liye main aapko bata deta hun aap IndiaMART ki ek website hai dir.indiamart uska link bhej dunga aapke whatsapp par.
Executive: Haan theek hai link bhej do aap uska.
Executive: Theek hai ji haan wahan se aap jaake search karna apna jo bhi aapko paint purchase karna hai aur wahan na location dal dena Gorakhpur ya fir ek dusri thi na Kanpur.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Haan fir aap.
Executive: Fir aapke samne jo jo dealers aaye unko call kar lena ek baar.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Ab wo link main aapko link bhejta hun.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Okay ji.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay ji thank you sir.
Customer: Theek hai ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer called customer care by mistake.

- Wants to find paint suppliers in Kanpur/Gorakhpur.

- Wants to add RCC road work category.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to search on IndiaMART.

- Agreed to add RCC road work category.

- Executive will send link to purchase paint.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to send link on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- indiamart, rcc road work, paint, customer care
